bounce.logic
Class Converter

java.lang.Object
  bounce.logic.Converter

public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods and constants for converting between various units.

Constructor Detail

Converter

Method Detail

toPixels

public static int toPixels(double meters)
Converts the specified value from meters to pixels based on a preset scale. If there is a fraction remaining, it will be rounded to the nearest pixel, with fractions >= 0.5 being rounded up.

Parameters:
meters - the value to be converted (in meters)
Returns:
the number of pixels

toMeters

public static double toMeters(int pixels)
Converts the specified value from pixels to meters based on a preset scale.

Parameters:
pixels - the value to be converted (in pixels)
Returns:
the number of meters

invertYValue

public static int invertYValue(double y,
                               double diameter,
                               int windowHeight)
Gets the position on the Y axis at which an object is to be painted. This is necessary since when thinking of an object's height in meters, zero is the ground, whereas when the object is painted, zero is at the top of the window.

Parameters:
y - the distance of the object from the ground in meters
diameter - the diameter (or height, if not a circle) in meters
windowHeight - the height of the drawing space in pixels
Returns:
the Y position at which the object should be painted
